Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: consume heart
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Consume a healthy and fresh heart, either from a corpse or a downed pawn. Each heart consumed will increase lycanthropic stress limit by one.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: adrenaline rush
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Cause adrenaline to surge throughout the body, completely nullifying pain and staunching bleeding for a short duration.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: beast howl
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Unleash a terrifying howl that momentarily stuns all nearby hostiles.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: beast leap
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Leap to a nearby location using strong beastial legs.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: huntsman's bounty
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Place a bounty on a target. Successfully killing the target in time will grant a gold reward based on the targets combat power.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: huntsman's mark
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Mark a target, increasing all damage the target takes by 50% for a short period of time.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: moon veil
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Blend into the moonlight, effectively becoming invisible to others. This ability can only be used at night, or during specific lunar conditions.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.label: summon spectral werewolf
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeAbilityDef.description: Summon a spectral werewolf to temporarily fight alongside you. It will prioritise targets marked by the Huntsman's mark ability.
